summary: Makes the Dwarven Sphere Centurion Arrow playable. Along with that the arrow is now craftable at a forge and is added to leveled list.
descriptionHtml:
Makes the Dwarven Sphere Centurion Arrow playable. Along with that the arrow is now craftable at a forge and is added to leveled list.
At the forge it requires 2 Dwemer ingots and 24 Dwemer arrows. This produces 24 Dwarven Sphere Centurion Arrows.
No requirements
Compatible with all mods
No bugs

This is my very first mod and I'm looking for more challenging projects. Message me your ideas.
author: AsianAp0calypse
